# Copilot Instructions

## General Guidelines
- Apply changes only to layout, styling, and UX; do not change business logic or data bindings.

## UI/UX Design Preferences
- Prefer a modern fintech UI with:
  - Clean minimal design
  - Soft shadows
  - Rounded corners
  - Balanced spacing
  - Consistent color palette
  - Clear visual hierarchy
  - Smooth hover and focus states
  - Mobile-responsive layout
